name: Hyperdevotion Noire: Goddess Black Heart
summary: Hyperdevotion Noire: Goddess Black Heart is a tactical role-playing game developed by Sting and Compile Heart The game is a spin-off title of the Hyperdimension Neptunia game series featuring Noire as the main character. The game features chibi versions of the original Hyperdimension Neptunia characters which battle against enemies on a tactical grid map. The gameplay is turn-based, and map elevation has an effect on characters' abilities and mobility; certain units are more capable of climbing to higher terrain than others, and units take damage from falling. The field maps feature various gimmicks, including rail cars, flaming pits, logs, artillery batteries, laser beams and moving platforms.

alternative_names.name: Chou Megami Shinkou Noire Gekishin Black Heart
Chou Megami Shinkou Noire: Gekishin Black Heart
超女神信仰ノワール　激神ブラックハート

esrb.synopsis: This is a strategy role-playing game in which players assume the role of a secretary who helps a leader unite a fantasy world. Players visit different nations, interact with leaders, and battle various fantastical creatures (e.g., giant vegetables, robots, cat creatures) and humans in turn-based combat. Players use weapon attacks from a menu screen to kill creatures and other enemies. Battles are accompanied by impact sounds, cries of pain, and colorful light effects. The game includes suggestive/sexual material in still-image sequences and dialogue: characters bathing in a shower with exposed buttocks and/or partially obscured breasts; female characters grabbing another character's breasts; a character making suggestive remarks (e.g. “I'll lube you up real nice”; “You gotta embrace the nudist in you”; “With your meat tenderized, I will enjoy feasting on you with my eyes.”). The words “sh*t” and “a*s” are heard in the dialogue.
